rules_text: As as long as you have 10 or less life, this creature has trample and vigilance.
flavor_text: [i]She was first to break the silence: “Emmerich, we've been here for hours . . .” He looked down at her, shook his head, and chuckled. “And we will be here for hours yet, Kriemhild, if that is what it takes to teach you how to listen.”[/i]
